<<<<<<< HEAD
The exhortation of Salomon. By H.A. H. A. (Henry Arthington)
[72] p.
Printed [by T. Scarlet] for Cuthbert Burby, London : 1594.
H.A. = Henry Arthington. Printer's name from STC. Running title reads: The exhortation to Salomon. Includes, with caption title: A briefe praier of the foresayd text. Signatures: A-I⁴ (A1 blank). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
The exhortation of Salomon. By H.A. H. A. (Henry Arthington)
[72] p.
Printed [by T. Scarlet] for Cuthbert Burby, London : 1594.
H.A. = Henry Arthington. Printer's name from STC. Running title reads: The exhortation to Salomon. Includes, with caption title: A briefe praier of the foresayd text. Signatures: A-I⁴ (A1 blank). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Cuthbert Burby
T. Scarlet]
